releaseNotes: CONFIRMED goes dark with a new, deep black design aesthetic and more for an elevated browsing experience.
description:
The adidas CONFIRMED app is the newest, most exclusive destination to shop for cool designer and collector trainers, shoes and sneakers.

The CONFIRMED app gives you unprecedented insider access to an exclusive curated collection of adidas collabs and hyped drops for men and women. The CONFIRMED app is guaranteed to bring you refined and exclusive content to deliver a premium, adidas community offering.

Be part of the adidas community, with access to cool designers and collectors' insights and stories. 

A Sneakerhead's DREAM!

Download the CONFIRMED app today!

EXCLUSIVE PRODUCTS AND SNEAKERS
Offering only a curated selection of exclusive collabs and new designs, CONFIRMED is a community hub where you'll go deep into the world of adidas. You'll love how the app will help you get your hands on premium drops and the coolest kicks.

Love to shop for Gucci, Balenciaga or Y-3s? 

Set up your personal profile on the app to receive notifications and alerts for the exclusive release dates of your favourite sneakers designs for men and women. You’ll have advance warning of release dates of exclusive collabs with Pharrell Williams, Gucci, Balenciaga, Silas Baxter and Dennis Busenita.
Enter draws for a great chance to get the newest cool kicks from Yeezy, Kanye or Original sneakers for men and women, wherever you are.

It's simple to register and build your profile and preferences on our new CONFIRMED app. Then you can sit back and enjoy being amongst the first to access curated collections and explore the stories behind the 3-Stripes. Can’t wait to find out which sneakers are the next big thing, or do you want to know the latest adidas release date?

Buy sneakers and the most hyped apparel, track your orders, and view purchase history all in the app.

Download the adidas CONFIRMED app today! 

IN-DEPTH ADIDAS NEWS
As well as getting the inside scoops on the latest trainers and shoes for men and women from adidas, the app is the newest way to connect with the adidas and CONFIRMED community. Access exclusive content and elevated storytelling from our top-rated tastemakers. Discover the creative visions behind the latest exclusive designs, trainers and shoes. Enjoy stories from the Original community.

ACCESS TEAM ADIDAS
Meet the friends and family behind adidas on CONFIRMED. With our partners in music (like Kanye), fashion, art and streetwear, this is the place where the conversation happens and the inspiration comes to light.

DOWNLOAD CONFIRMED TODAY!
Become part of the story and never miss a hype drop again. Download it today! The adidas CONFIRMED app deep-dives into the cool  universe of adidas shoes. From exclusive interviews with emerging tastemakers and news about the next releases — the app gives you exclusive insider access to the creative designer vision behind the latest exclusive trainers, hype drops and stories from the Originals community. Be the first to find out about the next YEEZY, Y-3, Gucci, Balenciaga and ZX trainers hype drop and much more.
